snippet.title: The Weirdest Two Minutes Of Your Day Will Be Spent Watching David Lynch's Intro To Twin Peaks' Comic-Con Panel
snippet.content:
Video: David Lynch did not attend the recent San Diego Comic-Con, but he was there in spirit - delivering maybe the single weirdest panel introduction in convention history. Would you expect any less from the wonderfully creative and twisted mind behind Twin Peaks? That was a damn good lamp!
Image: Showtime
The footage has finally made its way online, and, well... you should just stop what you're doing and watch it right now. The 13th instalment of Twin Peaks: The Return will be available Monday on Stan.

sindex.name: Day Will Be Spent Watching David Lynch's Intro To Twin Peaks' Comic-Con Panel
